      • createDeployment

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @RequestMapping(value="/deployments",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="#oauth2.throwOnError(#oauth2.hasAnyScope(\'offline_access\', \'fts:submit-transfer\'))")
public DeploymentResource createDeployment(@RequestBody
